name: Puzzle Escape (lzerna)
description:
LEFT/RIGHT or A/D= directional movement

Space bar, UP, W = jump (The longer you hold jump key the higher it will jump)

-Collect 3 keys in every level then go to an orange arrow object to proceed to the next level. There are 10 stages for now with variations of difficulty.

Red objects = You'll restart the current level when your character touches these objects.

Blue objects = indicates it's a movable platform.

White objects = are basic floor.

Yellow objects = will fall once a player steps on it.

Light Blue objects = indicates it's slippery floor.

Black objects = indicates a trap is under it

Gray Blue objects  = indicates a trap is beneath its ground, and also a slippery floor.
